abstract: In this undated audio clip, Mr. Transtromer discusses and reads his poem, "Schubertiana."
snippet: In this undated audio clip, Mr. Transtromer discusses and reads his poem, "Schubertiana."
lead_paragraph: The Swedish poet Tomas Transtromer, who won the 2011 Nobel Prize for Literature on Thursday, is the first Swede to win the prize since 1974. Julie Bosman writes that Mr. Transtromer's "sometimes bleak but powerful work explores themes of nature, isolation and identity."

headline.main: A Poetry Reading from Nobel Prize Winner Tomas Transtromer
